languages.text: "Генетические и химические, Ваша Светлость. Безвредные виды мутируют и проявляют агрессию, а растения меняют химический состав и становятся ядовитыми. Это происходит все чаще, и, если не принять меры, экосистема мира будет непоправимо нарушена".

traits.locale_text: "Генетические и химические, Ваше Благородие. Безвредные виды мутируют и проявляют агрессию, а растения меняют химический состав и становятся ядовитыми. Это происходит все чаще, и, если не принять меры, экосистема мира будет непоправимо нарушена".

languages.text: "Genetic and chemical pathologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Harmless species mutate and become aggressive, while plants change their chemical composition and become poisonous. This is happening more and more often, and if no action is taken, the ecosystem of the world will be irreparably disrupted."
languages.original_text: "Генетические и химические, Ваша Светлость. Безвредные виды мутируют и проявляют агрессию, а растения меняют химический состав и становятся ядовитыми. Это происходит все чаще, и, если не принять меры, экосистема мира будет непоправимо нарушена".

traits.locale_text: "Genetic and chemical pathologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Harmless species mutate and become aggressive, while plants change their chemical composition and become poisonous. This is happening more and more often, and if you do not take action, the ecosystem of the world will be irreparably disrupted."

"Genetic and chemical pathologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Harmless species mutate and become aggressive, while plants change their chemical composition and become poisonous. This is happening more and more often, and if you do not take action, the ecosystem of the world will be irreparably disrupted."

"Genetic and chemical pathologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Harmless species mutate and become aggressive, while plants change their chemical composition and become poisonous. This is happening more and more often, and if you do not take action, the ecosystem of the world will be irreparably disrupted."

"Genetic and chemical pathologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Harmless species mutate and become aggressive, while plants change their chemical composition and become poisonous. This is happening more and more often, and if you do not take action, the ecosystem of the world will be irreparably disrupted."

languages.text: 「遺伝的および化学的病変です、陛下。無害な種が変異して攻撃性が増し、植物に関しては化学成分が変化し有毒化しています。この頻度はますます増えており、対策を講じなければ、この星の生態系は取り返しがつかなくなるほど壊れてしまうでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Genetic and chemical pathologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Harmless species mutate and become aggressive, while plants change their chemical composition and become poisonous. This is happening more and more often, and if no action is taken, the ecosystem of the world will be irreparably disrupted."

traits.locale_text: 「遺伝的および化学的病変です、陛下。無害な種が変異して攻撃性が増し、植物に関しては化学成分が変化し有毒化しています。この頻度はますます増えており、対策を講じなければ、この星の生態系は取り返しがつかなくなるほど壊れてしまうでしょう」

languages.text: “是遗传与化学方面的病变，大人。无害的动物发生变异，变得具有攻击性，而植物则改变了化学成分，变得有毒。这样的情况发生得越来越频繁，如果不采取行动的话，这个世界的生态系统将会遭到无法挽回的破坏。”
languages.original_text: "Genetic and chemical pathologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Harmless species mutate and become aggressive, while plants change their chemical composition and become poisonous. This is happening more and more often, and if no action is taken, the ecosystem of the world will be irreparably disrupted."

traits.locale_text: “是遗传与化学方面的病变，大人。无害的动物发生变异，变得具有攻击性，而植物则改变了化学成分，变得有毒。这样的情况发生得越来越频繁，如果您不采取行动的话，这个世界的生态系统将会遭到无法挽回的破坏。”

languages.text: «Patologías genéticas y químicas, {mf|milord|milady}. Las especies inofensivas mutan y se tornan agresivas, así como las plantas cambian su composición química y adquieren características venenosas. Este fenómeno es cada vez más común y, si nadie lo impide, el ecosistema de este mundo quedará alterado irremediablemente».
languages.original_text: "Genetic and chemical pathologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Harmless species mutate and become aggressive, while plants change their chemical composition and become poisonous. This is happening more and more often, and if no action is taken, the ecosystem of the world will be irreparably disrupted."

traits.locale_text: «Patologías genéticas y químicas, {mf|milord|milady}. Las especies inofensivas mutan y se tornan agresivas, así como las plantas cambian su composición química y adquieren características venenosas. Este fenómeno es cada vez más común y, de no tomar cartas en el asunto, el ecosistema de este mundo quedará alterado irremediablemente».

languages.text: "Genetischer und chemischer Natur, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Harmlose Spezies mutieren und werden aggressiv, Pflanzen ändern ihre chemische Zusammensetzung und werden giftig. Die Häufigkeit solcher Entwicklungen steigt, und wenn Ihr nichts unternehmt, wird das Ökosystem der Welt irreparabel gestört."
languages.original_text: "Genetic and chemical pathologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Harmless species mutate and become aggressive, while plants change their chemical composition and become poisonous. This is happening more and more often, and if no action is taken, the ecosystem of the world will be irreparably disrupted."

traits.locale_text: "Genetischer und chemischer Natur, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Harmlose Spezies mutieren und werden aggressiv, Pflanzen ändern ihre chemische Zusammensetzung und werden giftig. Die Häufigkeit solcher Entwicklungen steigt, und wenn Ihr nichts unternehmt, wird das Ökosystem der Welt irreparabel gestört."

languages.text: « Des pathologies génétiques et chimiques, Votre Seigneurie. Des espèces inoffensives mutent pour devenir agressives, et certaines plantes modifient leur composition chimique pour devenir vénéneuses. Cela se produit de plus en plus fréquemment ; si personne n'intervient, c'est tout l'écosystème de ce monde qui en sera irrémédiablement perturbé. »
languages.original_text: "Genetic and chemical pathologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Harmless species mutate and become aggressive, while plants change their chemical composition and become poisonous. This is happening more and more often, and if no action is taken, the ecosystem of the world will be irreparably disrupted."

traits.locale_text: « Des pathologies génétiques et chimiques, Votre Seigneurie. Des espèces inoffensives mutent pour devenir agressives, et certaines plantes modifient leur composition chimique pour devenir vénéneuses. Cela se produit de plus en plus fréquemment ; si vous ne faites rien, c'est tout l'écosystème de ce monde qui en sera irrémédiablement perturbé. »

languages.text: "Genetik ve kimyasal patolojiler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Zararsız türler mutasyon geçirip saldırganlaşıyor, kimyasal yapıları değişen bitkilerse zehirli hâle geliyor. Bu olgu sık gerçekleşmeye başladı. Eyleme geçilmediği takdirde dünyanın ekosistemi, geri döndürülemez bir şekilde bozulacak."
languages.original_text: "Genetic and chemical pathologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Harmless species mutate and become aggressive, while plants change their chemical composition and become poisonous. This is happening more and more often, and if no action is taken, the ecosystem of the world will be irreparably disrupted."

traits.locale_text: "Genetik ve kimyasal patolojiler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Zararsız türler mutasyon geçirip saldırganlaşıyor, kimyasal yapıları değişen bitkilerse zehirli hâle geliyor. Bu olgu sık gerçekleşmeye başladı. Eyleme geçilmediği takdirde dünyanın ekosistemi, geri döndürülemez bir şekilde bozulacak."
